channel.title: HPE Pdu on Cray System Management (CSM)
channel.description: Recent content in HPE Pdu on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: HPE Pdu Admin Procedures
item.description: HPE PDU Admin Procedures The following procedures are used to manage the HPE Power Distribution Unit (PDU): Connect to HPE PDU Web Interface HPE PDU Initial Set-up Update HPE PDU Firmware Change HPE PDU User Passwords Discover HPE PDU after Upgrading CSM IMPORTANT: Because of the polling method used to process sensor data from the HPE PDU, telemetry data may take up to six minutes to refresh; this includes the outlet status reported by the Hardware State Manager (HSM).
